html:
New Delhi

New Delhi, Feb. 9 -- The Supreme Court on Tuesday called the protracted legal battle between Amazon and Future Group "a luxury litigation", expressing displeasure at unending requests being made by one party or another. The bench, headed by Chief Justice of India (CJI) NV Ramana, was livid after Amazon sought to file a seven-page note on a matter in which the court reserved its judgment on February 3. P21 Published by HT Digital Content Services with permission from Hindustan Times.
